QuestData.Title: Artisan's Supply: Chef's Smooth Rolling Pin
QuestData.Description:
Are you looking for work, scribe?
I received an order from a company called the Artisan's Consortium.
It seems like a simple enough task for an apprentice crafter such as yourself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver a Chef's Smooth Rolling Pin to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver a Chef's Smooth Rolling Pin to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.

Objectives.Objective: Deliver a Chef's Smooth Rolling Pin to Haephesta
